text:
Originally reported by: **Claudiu Popa (BitBucket: [PCManticore](http://bitbucket.org/PCManticore), GitHub: @PCManticore)**

---

Until we'll have support for descriptors transforming methods into properties, we need to update the list of possible properties with a new member `lazy`.

---
- Bitbucket: https://bitbucket.org/logilab/astroid/issue/279
title: Add `lazy` to the list of possible decorator properties
Add `lazy` to the list of possible decorator properties
